topic.title: How to Factory Reset Fanvil Phones

body.p: Before you start to provision Fanvil phones with , you need to reset Fanvil phones to factory default settings. Otherwise, Auto Provision may fail because of the previous configurations on the phone.
This guide takes Fanvil X5S running firmware 1.8.0 as an example.

ol.li:
Find the phone IP address.
Navigate to Menu Status Network on the phone.

Log in the phone web interface with your username and password.
username: admin
password: admin

Click Reset.
A pop-up dialog prompts you whether to reset the phone.

Click OK.
The phone will be reset successfully after startup.
Do not power off during phone startup.
